attributes.action: Refund university accommodation fees while students are not allowed to be there.
attributes.additional_details: Students are already in debt with £9,000 tuition fees whilst only receiving only online lectures. Therefore should not have to pay for rooms that they are strictly not allowed to live in. The government have stated that students must not travel back to university meaning that they cannot physically live in their accommodation.
attributes.background: To allow university students to have their fees for accommodation that they are not allowed to use refunded due to the government guidelines meaning that they are not allowed to travel to university.

rejection.details:
Suspending payments for rent or ending a tenancy early is a matter for individual landlords, and not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enable all students to end university tenancy agreements early due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285

Implement support for university students during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554299
